statements: SELECT * FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock FROM replenishment_items WHERE reorder_point > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT MAX(current_stock) FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT MIN(current_stock) FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT AVG(current_stock) FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT SUM(current_stock) FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM replenishment_items ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM replenishment_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_items LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE reorder_point < current_stock;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock = (SELECT MAX(current_stock) FROM replenishment_items);
SELECT DISTINCT item_name FROM replenishment_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE reorder_point IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_items WHERE item_name IN ('Item A', 'Item B', 'Item C');
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock <= reorder_point ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name AS name, current_stock AS stock_quantity FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock < 10
SELECT * FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock > reorder_point OR current_stock = 0
SELECT DISTINCT current_stock FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock < 20 ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock + reorder_point AS total_quantity FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock >= 20
SELECT item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%shoes%'
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM replenishment_items WHERE item_name IN ('Shirt', 'Pants', 'Hat')
SELECT * FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock > 50 AND reorder_point < 30
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock = reorder_point + 5
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock < 30 AND reorder_point <= 10 ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock > 0 LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM replenishment_items
SELECT AVG(current_stock) AS average_stock FROM replenishment_items
SELECT SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM replenishment_items
SELECT MIN(current_stock) AS min_stock, MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock FROM replenishment_items
SELECT item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock IS NOT NULL ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE item_name NOT LIKE '%jacket%'
SELECT item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM replenishment_items WHERE current_stock != reorder_point
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM replenishment_items WHERE item_name = 'Socks'
SELECT * FROM items
SELECT item_name FROM items
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items
SELECT item_id, reorder_point FROM items
SELECT * FROM reorder_logs
SELECT item_id, reorder_date FROM reorder_logs
SELECT log_id, item_id, reorder_date FROM reorder_logs
SELECT * FROM items WHERE reorder_point < 10
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM reorder_logs WHERE new_reorder_point > 20
SELECT item_id, reorder_date FROM reorder_logs WHERE item_id = 5
SELECT * FROM items ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM reorder_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM items
SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) FROM reorder_logs GROUP BY item_id
SELECT item_id, AVG(new_reorder_point) FROM reorder_logs GROUP BY item_id
SELECT item_id, MAX(new_reorder_point) FROM reorder_logs GROUP BY item_id
SELECT item_id, MIN(new_reorder_point) FROM reorder_logs GROUP BY item_id
SELECT item_id, SUM(new_reorder_point) FROM reorder_logs GROUP BY item_id
SELECT item_id, new_reorder_point, COUNT(*) FROM reorder_logs GROUP BY item_id, new_reorder_point
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT item_id, item_name, reorder_point FROM items WHERE reorder_point < 10;
SELECT item_name, COUNT(item_name) AS total_count FROM items GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, reorder_logs.reorder_date FROM items INNER JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id;
SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, reorder_logs.reorder_date FROM items LEFT JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id;
SELECT items.item_name, reorder_logs.reorder_date FROM items RIGHT JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id;
SELECT items.item_name, MAX(reorder_logs.new_reorder_point) AS max_reorder_point FROM items INNER JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id GROUP BY items.item_name;
SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, reorder_logs.reorder_date FROM items INNER JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id WHERE items.item_id = 10;
SELECT items.item_name, reorder_logs.reorder_date FROM items INNER JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id WHERE reorder_logs.reorder_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, SUM(reorder_logs.new_reorder_point) AS total_reorder_point FROM items INNER JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id GROUP BY items.item_id;
SELECT item_name, COUNT(item_name) AS total_count FROM items GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT item_name, MAX(reorder_point) - MIN(reorder_point) AS reorder_point_range FROM items GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT item_id, item_name, reorder_point FROM items ORDER BY item_name ASC, reorder_point DESC;
SELECT item_name, CASE WHEN reorder_point < 5 THEN 'Low' WHEN reorder_point < 10 THEN 'Medium' ELSE 'High' END AS reorder_status FROM items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM items LEFT JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id GROUP BY item_id;
SELECT item_name, REVERSE(item_name) AS reversed_name FROM items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, reorder_date, new_reorder_point FROM items LEFT JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id ORDER BY reorder_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, AVG(reorder_point) AS avg_reorder_point FROM items GROUP BY item_name HAVING avg_reorder_point > 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, reorder_point, DATE_ADD(reorder_date, INTERVAL 30 DAY) AS new_reorder_date FROM items INNER JOIN reorder_logs ON items.item_id = reorder_logs.item_id;
SELECT * FROM item_inventory;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT replenishment_id, item_id, replenishment_date FROM replenishment_history;
SELECT item_name, quantity_replenished FROM item_inventory JOIN replenishment_history ON item_inventory.item_id = replenishment_history.item_id;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_history WHERE quantity_replenished > 100;
SELECT task_id, item_id, task_date FROM reorder_tasks;
SELECT item_name, task_date FROM item_inventory JOIN reorder_tasks ON item_inventory.item_id = reorder_tasks.item_id;
SELECT * FROM reorder_tasks WHERE is_complete = FALSE;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory WHERE current_stock <= 5;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory WHERE current_stock <= 5 AND item_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT item_name, quantity_replenished FROM item_inventory JOIN replenishment_history ON item_inventory.item_id = replenishment_history.item_id WHERE replenishment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, task_date FROM item_inventory JOIN reorder_tasks ON item_inventory.item_id = reorder_tasks.item_id WHERE task_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory WHERE item_name IN ('Chair', 'Table', 'Desk');
SELECT item_id, AVG(quantity_replenished) AS avg_replenished_quantity FROM replenishment_history GROUP BY item_id;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity_replenished) AS total_replenished_quantity FROM item_inventory JOIN replenishment_history ON item_inventory.item_id = replenishment_history.item_id GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT item_name, COUNT(*) AS replenishment_count FROM item_inventory JOIN replenishment_history ON item_inventory.item_id = replenishment_history.item_id GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT item_name, MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock FROM item_inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING max_stock > 50;
SELECT * FROM item_inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM item_inventory WHERE item_id = 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM item_inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM replenishment_history WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT SUM(quantity_replenished) AS total_replenished FROM replenishment_history WHERE replenishment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT item_inventory.item_id, item_inventory.item_name, replenishment_history.quantity_replenished FROM item_inventory INNER JOIN replenishment_history ON item_inventory.item_id = replenishment_history.item_id;
SELECT r.task_id, r.item_id, r.task_date, i.item_name FROM reorder_tasks r INNER JOIN item_inventory i ON r.item_id = i.item_id;
SELECT * FROM item_inventory i LEFT JOIN replenishment_history r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;
SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.current_stock, r.replenishment_date, r.quantity_replenished FROM item_inventory i RIGHT JOIN replenishment_history r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;
SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, COALESCE(r.quantity_replenished, 0) AS quantity_replenished FROM item_inventory i LEFT JOIN replenishment_history r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM item_inventory UNION SELECT item_id, 'Replenishment' AS item_name FROM replenishment_history;

SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, COALESCE(r.quantity_replenished, 0) AS quantity_replenished FROM item_inventory i LEFT JOIN replenishment_history r ON i.item_id = r.item_id WHERE r.replenishment_date > '2022-01-15';
SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, (i.current_stock - COALESCE(r.quantity_replenished, 0)) AS available_stock FROM item_inventory i LEFT JOIN replenishment_history r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;
SELECT * FROM item_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%banana%';
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM item_inventory WHERE item_name IN ('Apple', 'Orange', 'Grapes');
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, LAG(current_stock) OVER(ORDER BY item_id) AS prev_stock FROM item_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, LEAD(current_stock) OVER(ORDER BY item_id) AS next_stock FROM item_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY current_stock DESC) AS ranking FROM item_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, FIRST_VALUE(item_id) OVER(ORDER BY current_stock) AS first_item FROM item_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, NTILE(3) OVER(ORDER BY current_stock) AS stock_range FROM item_inventory;
SELECT * FROM items;
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM items;
SELECT * FROM reorders;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_stocked FROM items JOIN inventory ON items.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT item_name, reorder_quantity FROM items JOIN reorders ON items.item_id = reorders.item_id;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers JOIN reorders ON suppliers.supplier_id = reorders.supplier_id;
SELECT item_name, reorder_quantity, reorder_date FROM items JOIN reorders ON items.item_id = reorders.item_id;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, item_name, reorder_quantity FROM suppliers JOIN reorders ON suppliers.supplier_id = reorders.supplier_id JOIN items ON reorders.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reorders WHERE reorder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_name = 'Item1';
SELECT * FROM reorders WHERE reorder_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Supplier%';
SELECT item_name, reorder_date FROM items JOIN reorders ON items.item_id = reorders.item_id WHERE reorder_quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, item_name, reorder_date FROM suppliers JOIN reorders ON suppliers.supplier_id = reorders.supplier_id JOIN items ON reorders.item_id = items.item_id WHERE reorder_quantity > 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, reorder_quantity, reorder_date FROM items JOIN reorders ON items.item_id = reorders.item_id WHERE item_name LIKE '%Item%';
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items WHERE reorder_point > 10;
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM items WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50);
SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, r.reorder_quantity, r.reorder_date FROM items i INNER JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;
SELECT i.item_name, s.supplier_name, s.supplier_contact FROM items i INNER JOIN suppliers s ON i.item_id = s.supplier_id;

SELECT i.item_name, i.reorder_point, r.reorder_quantity, r.reorder_date, s.supplier_name FROM items i INNER JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id INNER JOIN suppliers s ON i.item_id = s.supplier_id;

SELECT s.supplier_name, i.item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id INNER JOIN inventory inv ON i.item_id = inv.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name, i.item_name;
SELECT i.item_name, inv.quantity, inv.last_stocked FROM items i LEFT JOIN inventory inv ON i.item_id = inv.item_id;
SELECT s.supplier_name, MIN(i.reorder_point) AS min_reorder_point, MAX(i.reorder_point) AS max_reorder_point FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;

SELECT s.supplier_name, i.item_name, r.reorder_date, COUNT(*) AS total_reorders FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id INNER JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name, i.item_name, r.reorder_date;

SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, r.reorder_quantity, r.reorder_date, s.supplier_name FROM items i INNER JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id INNER JOIN suppliers s ON i.item_id = s.supplier_id WHERE r.reorder_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT i.item_name, inv.quantity, inv.last_stocked FROM items i RIGHT JOIN inventory inv ON i.item_id = inv.item_id;
SELECT s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name;
SELECT i.item_name, i.reorder_point, r.reorder_quantity, r.reorder_date FROM items i LEFT JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;

SELECT s.supplier_name, i.item_name, r.reorder_date, COUNT(*) AS total_reorders FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name, i.item_name, r.reorder_date;
SELECT i.item_name, inv.quantity, inv.last_stocked FROM items i FULL JOIN inventory inv ON i.item_id = inv.item_id;
SELECT s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM suppliers s RIGHT JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name;
SELECT i.item_name, i.reorder_point, r.reorder_quantity, r.reorder_date FROM items i JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;

SELECT s.supplier_name, i.item_name, r.reorder_date, COUNT(*) AS total_reorders FROM suppliers s JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id JOIN reorders r ON i.item_id = r.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name, i.item_name, r.reorder_date;
SELECT i.item_name, inv.quantity, inv.last_stocked FROM items i CROSS JOIN inventory inv;
SELECT s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM suppliers s JOIN items i ON s.supplier_id = i.item_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM ReorderItems;
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM ReorderItems;
SELECT reorder_point, reorder_quantity FROM ReorderItems WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_id, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < 20;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john.doe';
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM ReorderItems JOIN Inventory ON ReorderItems.item_id = Inventory.item_id;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM ReorderItems JOIN Orders ON ReorderItems.item_id = Orders.item_id;
SELECT item_id, reorder_quantity FROM ReorderItems WHERE reorder_quantity > (SELECT AVG(reorder_quantity) FROM ReorderItems);
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Orders);
SELECT * FROM ReorderItems ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM Suppliers JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.item_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT item_id, current_stock, last_restocked_date FROM Inventory WHERE last_restocked_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT supplier_name AS Supplier, SUM(quantity) AS Total_Quantity FROM Suppliers JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.item_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM ReorderItems
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM ReorderItems
SELECT DISTINCT item_name FROM ReorderItems
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM ReorderItems WHERE reorder_quantity > 10
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers
SELECT supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE LENGTH(supplier_name) > 10
SELECT current_stock, last_restocked_date FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ReorderItems JOIN Inventory ON ReorderItems.item_id = Inventory.item_id
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.quantity, Inventory.current_stock FROM Orders LEFT JOIN Inventory ON Orders.item_id = Inventory.item_id
SELECT Users.username, Orders.order_id, Inventory.current_stock FROM Users JOIN Orders ON Users.user_id = Orders.item_id JOIN Inventory ON Orders.item_id = Inventory.item_id
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM ReorderItems UNION SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM Inventory
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT item_name, reorder_point FROM ReorderItems WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM Inventory)
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Users JOIN Orders ON Users.user_id = Orders.item_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_orders > 2
